text: This is a list of municipalities in Ontario, Canada. Ontario has three types of municipalities: upper-tier, lower-tier, and single-tier. A few lower-tier municipalities can be inside one upper-tier municipality. A single-tier municipality is separate from other municipalities. A lower-tier or single- tier municipality can be a city, town, village, township, or just a municipality. An upper-tier municipality can be a county, region, or district municipality. == Upper-tier municipalities == Ontario has 30 upper-tier municipalities that include multiple lower-tier municipalities. These upper- tier municipalities include 19 counties, 3 united counties and 8 regional municipalities or regions.> List of upper-tier municipalities in Ontario Name Municipal sub-type 2021 Census of Population 2021 Census of Population 2021 Census of Population 2021 Census of Population 2021 Census of Population Name Municipal sub-type Population (2021) Population (2016) Change Land area (km2) Population density (/km2) Bruce County Dufferin County Durham Regional municipality Elgin County Essex County Frontenac County Grey County Haliburton County Halton Regional municipality Hastings County Huron County Lambton County Lanark County Leeds and Grenville United counties Lennox and Addington County Middlesex County Muskoka Regional municipality Niagara Regional municipality Northumberland County Oxford Regional municipality Peel Regional municipality Perth County Peterborough County Prescott and Russell United counties Renfrew County Simcoe County Stormont, Dundas and Glengarry United counties Waterloo Regional municipality Wellington County York Regional municipality Total upper-tier municipalities Total counties Total united counties Total regional municipalities Province of Ontario == Local municipalities (single-tier and lower-tier) == Ontario has 414 local municipalities. This includes 173 single-tier municipalities and 241 lower- tier municipalities. The 173 single-tier municipalities include 32 cities, 23 municipalities, 28 towns, 85 townships, and 5 villages. The 241 lower-tier municipalities include 19 cities, 41 municipalities, 61 towns, 114 townships and 6 villages.
